[%collapsible]
.Click to expand
====
This is collapsible content.
====

[%collapsible%open]
.Initially open
====
This content is visible by default.
====

[%collapsible]
====
No title collapsible block.
====

[example%collapsible]
Collapsible paragraph without title.

[example%collapsible]
.Click to reveal
Collapsible paragraph with title.

[example%collapsible%open]
.Open paragraph
Collapsible paragraph initially open.
